price: He said, “It truly saddens me that you should take him away, and I fear that a wolf may eat him when you are negligent of him.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadhhabū bihi wa-akhāfu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum ʿanhu ghāfilūna
